parameters.name: ItemsToConnect
parameters.description: Array of faces, edges, and vertices to which to connect the route line

parameters.name: Reverse
parameters.description: Array of Booleans indicating whether to reverse the route line at the corresponding item to connect; true to reverse the direction of the route line, false to not

parameters.name: AlternatePath
parameters.description: Array of Booleans indicating whether to display an alternate path at the corresponding item to connect; true to display another possible path for the route line, false to not

parameters.name: AlongXYZ
parameters.description: Array of Booleans indicating whether to create a path parallel to the X, Y, and Z directions from the corresponding item to connect; true to use the X, Y, and Z directions, false to use the shortest route

title: ISketch.InsertRouteLine
description: Inserts a route line in an explode line sketch or a 3D sketch to indicate component relationships.
signature:
System.Boolean InsertRouteLine( 
   System.Object
ItemsToConnect
,
   System.Object
Reverse
,
   System.Object
AlternatePath
,
   System.Object
AlongXYZ
)

parameters.name: ItemsToConnect
parameters.description: Array of faces, edges, and vertices to which to connect the route line

parameters.name: Reverse
parameters.description: Array of Booleans indicating whether to reverse the route line at the corresponding item to connect; true to reverse the direction of the route line, false to not

parameters.name: AlternatePath
parameters.description: Array of Booleans indicating whether to display an alternate path at the corresponding item to connect; true to display another possible path for the route line, false to not

parameters.name: AlongXYZ
parameters.description: Array of Booleans indicating whether to create a path parallel to the X, Y, and Z directions from the corresponding item to connect; true to use the X, Y, and Z directions, false to use the shortest route

returns: True if a route line is inserted, false if not
remarks:
You insert a route line in an
explode line sketch
.

Insert Explode Line Sketch and Route Line (VBA)
